text:
Priyanka Chopra, Nargis Fakhri, Riteish Deshmukh, Sakshi Tanwar attend BIG Star Young Entertainer Awards 2012 
Former Bigg Boss contestant Payal Rohatgi is facing the ire on social media platforms. A couple of days back, the lady claimed that she was caused a lot of trouble by the ground staff of Jet Airways. She claimed she was offloaded as she was a Hindu. 
Payal was travelling with her beau, wrestling champion Sangram Singh to Kerala. The flight was at 6.50am but they reached the airport at 6.20. In a Facebook live, she said that the staffers who offloaded them were Muslims and they were targeted for their religion. The actress expressed her ire on social media platforms saying that though she was a celeb she stood up for what was right.
